statements: SELECT * FROM stock_prices;
SELECT stock_id, stock_name, price FROM stock_prices WHERE price > 100;
SELECT stock_name, price FROM stock_prices ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT stock_name, price, timestamp FROM stock_prices WHERE stock_id = 1;
SELECT MAX(price) AS max_price FROM stock_prices;
SELECT stock_name, price FROM stock_prices WHERE stock_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM stock_prices WHERE price > 1000 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT stock_name, price FROM stock_prices WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT stock_name, COUNT(*) AS transaction_count FROM stock_prices GROUP BY stock_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 10;
SELECT stock_name, AVG(price) AS average_price FROM stock_prices GROUP BY stock_name ORDER BY average_price DESC;
SELECT * FROM stock_prices ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT symbol, price FROM stock_prices WHERE price > 100;
SELECT timestamp, symbol, price FROM stock_prices WHERE symbol = 'AAPL';
SELECT symbol, MAX(price) AS max_price FROM stock_prices GROUP BY symbol;
SELECT * FROM alerts WHERE condition LIKE '%high%' ORDER BY alert_id ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT symbol, price, timestamp FROM stock_prices WHERE symbol = 'AAPL';
SELECT * FROM stock_prices WHERE price > 100 AND symbol = 'GOOGL';
SELECT symbol, AVG(price) AS avg_price FROM stock_prices GROUP BY symbol;
SELECT timestamp, symbol FROM stock_prices ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM alerts WHERE condition LIKE '%high%' AND message IS NOT NULL ORDER BY alert_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM stock_prices ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT stock_symbol, price FROM stock_prices WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT stock_symbol, MAX(price) AS max_price FROM stock_prices GROUP BY stock_symbol;
SELECT * FROM investor_alerts WHERE investor_id = 123 ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT DISTINCT stock_symbol FROM investor_alerts ORDER BY stock_symbol;
SELECT stock_symbol, price FROM stock_prices WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT * FROM investor_alerts WHERE alert_condition LIKE '%urgent%'
SELECT stock_symbol, AVG(price) AS avg_price FROM stock_prices GROUP BY stock_symbol HAVING AVG(price) > 50 ORDER BY avg_price DESC
SELECT investor_id, COUNT(*) AS total_actions FROM investor_actions GROUP BY investor_id HAVING total_actions >= 5 ORDER BY total_actions DESC
SELECT investor_id, action_type, DATE(action_timestamp) AS date FROM investor_actions ORDER BY date ASC
SELECT * FROM StockPrices;
SELECT stock_symbol, price FROM StockPrices WHERE price > 100;
SELECT investor_name, email FROM Investors ORDER BY investor_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM Alerts WHERE stock_id = 101 AND investor_id = 201;
SELECT description, timestamp FROM TriggerLogs WHERE action_type = 'ALERT' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM StockPrices WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY last_updated DESC;
SELECT investor_name, email, phone_number FROM Investors ORDER BY investor_name ASC;
SELECT stock_symbol, price, last_updated FROM StockPrices WHERE stock_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM Alerts JOIN Investors ON Alerts.investor_id = Investors.investor_id WHERE Alerts.stock_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM TriggerLogs WHERE action_type = 'BUY' OR action_type = 'SELL' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT symbol, price, timestamp FROM stock_prices ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT symbol, price FROM stock_history WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY price ASC
SELECT symbol, price, timestamp FROM stock_history WHERE symbol = 'AAPL' LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM investors ORDER BY last_name ASC
SELECT * FROM alerts WHERE investor_id = 12345
SELECT * FROM stock_prices WHERE symbol = 'AAPL';
SELECT symbol, price FROM stock_prices ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT symbol, MAX(price) AS max_price FROM stock_prices GROUP BY symbol;
SELECT DISTINCT investor_id, first_name, last_name FROM investors INNER JOIN alerts ON investors.investor_id = alerts.investor_id;
SELECT * FROM alert_logs WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' AND message LIKE '%error%';
